metadata.title: CVE-2024-33601 glibc
metadata.description: nscd: netgroup cache may terminate daemon on memory allocation failure  The Name Service Cache Daemon's (nscd) netgroup cache uses xmalloc or xrealloc and these functions may terminate the process due to a memory allocation failure resulting in a denial of service to the clients.  The flaw was introduced in glibc 2.15 when the cache was added to nscd.  This vulnerability is only present in the nscd binary.
